## Issue Type

- [ ] Bug Report
- [ ] Feature Request
- [ ] Documentation Issue
- [ ] Question/Support
- [ ] Security Vulnerability (⚠️ **Please use security@cyberai.network instead**)

---

## Checklist

<!-- Check all that apply -->

- [ ] I have searched existing issues to avoid duplicates
- [ ] I have provided all requested information
